title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with profiles, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style plugin for VS Code powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for model testing and prompt evaluation.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting streaming chat, embeddings, and list/pull APIs.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private local LLM queries.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-to-run docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open-WebUI, Nextcloud, etc.
